name: Au Sable
summary: The spiritual successor to All Of Our Friends Are Dead. Au Sable is a dark adventure into the ruins of a forgotten city. You are a young woman in search of someone or something that has been swallowed up by tremendous and horrible beings. As you progress, the world descends deeper and deeper into confusion, guilt, and nightmarish hell. Alone but for a mysterious masked man who speaks in cryptic message, you must survive your way to Harmonia. Only then can the eyes behold the truth.
